mapper.insert: insert into join_individual(userId, userPw, userName, userEmail, userGender, userHP) values (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userGender}, #{userHP})
insert into join_corporation(userId, userPw, userName, userHP) values (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userHP})
insert into join_public(userId, userPw, userName, userHP) values (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userHP})
